website_summaries.verdict: A sleek blender that's perfect for daily countertop use. Available in a variety of colors.
pros: Besides the great design, the blender handles ice well and works quickly
The container is made of sturdy glass and the base is solid and doesn't move when the machine is running
cons: Various reports of the unit malfunctioning after some time

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing because I love the look of this blender and the fact it ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blender and accidentally broke the glass top which you cannot replace so I had to buy a replacement blender and the motor stopped working after the first month. I had a Warning blender very similar in look to this blender which lasted me over 20 years. The look may be the same but not the quality. Disappointing because I love the look of this blender and the fact it doesn't take up that much space on my counter.
customer_reviews.author: Kidder Erdman

customer_reviews.title: No recommendation.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the look of this blender and have come to expect Cuisinart to be a reputable brand, however, this is not one of their better products. Although the blender looks nice and feels high quality with the glass blender and the chrome base, it is not a reliable product. I had to return it due to it quickly overheating, and enveloping itself in smoke. Surprisingly poor product from a company I thought was known for its quality.
customer_reviews.author: vic

customer_reviews.title: so I think it's safe to say I'm quite pleased with this replacement for our trusty Waring blender that ...
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for several months now, so I think it's safe to say I'm quite pleased with this replacement for our trusty Waring blender that lasted 17 years of daily use. This blends a bit better, and a bit quicker. We really only use this to make smoothies, both fruit and veggie, so I can't speak for any other use, but it does a grand job for our purposes.
customer_reviews.author: top5jimmy53

customer_reviews.title: Caught On Fire
customer_reviews.text: Blender caught on fire and stopped working after several months. Cuisinart was unwilling to resolve the issue. Their customer support would not help at all. This was a complete disaster of a purchase. Stay away!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blender
customer_reviews.text: This blender - I love the look in my kitchen - I honestly use this for my smoothies and it blends so quickly - it is very sturdy - sits perfectly in the spot - love it
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: For cuisinart name not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: When we first inboxed and felt the weight we immediately thought, wow this is sturdy should last years and years. the spinner started to leak almost immediately. Since we didn't use it very much we figured we can deal with it. But know just two years later and very little use the small locking gear came off. Appears to be made of soft lead. It is worn off and came off the gear on the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Conrad Ramon

customer_reviews.title: No power ,
customer_reviews.text: Crumby blender , no power , over heats & shuts off constantly. Jar is unsecure fitting . Falls off when blending Pretty to look at in the counter but useless as a kitchen tool . I couldn’t return it so I put it in the trash Don’t buy this blender Buy a Osterizer for 1/4 the price And no problems
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great all around
customer_reviews.text: Excellent blender. The two speeds are plenty to make delicious smoothies. The only reason I give 4 stars is that you can't empty the jar from the bottom like on some other blenders (the blade mechanism doesn't come off). Also, a slightly more pointy spout would let you pour without dripping. Otherwise, a great product. Very satisfied! Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Agent Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Blender
customer_reviews.text: Never leaks. Used for fruit smoothies, handles it just great.
customer_reviews.author: B.D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Glass container is great for me as I am avoiding plastics as much as possible
customer_reviews.author: Kiki1000

customer_reviews.title: It is your every day easy to use uncomplicated  blender.
customer_reviews.text: We love this blender. It is easy to handle, love the glass, and the fact that it is one piece with no need to detach anything to wash, makes life less complicated. We have had it a very short time, but so far we are very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Molina

customer_reviews.title: More power than expected
customer_reviews.text: Make hummus with ease and frozen cocktails all day long. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Great Blender!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great blender! Comes with just 2 speeds, high and low and it's very easy to clean. I use it to make mainly milk shakes, and it does a great job. This blender is perfect when you don't need one of those larger ones.
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: The blade assembly gave up on me after 3 months. Could barely handle smoothie making. Hard to clean. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: jrossman325

customer_reviews.title: Color is not accurate
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item because the color was more pink than red.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great blender
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like my old Waring blender at half the price. However, it is a litter noisier. Hope it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Roselle J.

customer_reviews.title: Broke on the third use. Mesh between cutting blades ...
customer_reviews.text: Broke on the third use. Mesh between cutting blades inside glass container and motor connection made by idiots. Couldn't even blend soft bananas and strawberries. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Danel J.

customer_reviews.title: Well Made!!!!!!! Will last FOREVER!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: NO PLASTIC PARTS!!!!!! almost all modern appliances are made so cheap and flimsy today, I bought my kitchen aid mixer 20 years ago and it still works just as good as new. Why???? no plastic parts!!!!!! I bought a Ninja blender, CHEAPLY MADE!!!! I had to replace parts all the time, and it wasn't cheap to do so. This is a well made blender, it will last forever. Why pay for cheaply made products and have to spend more money down the line replacing parts or getting new appliances over and over, when you can just save yourself the headache and pay for a good one from the start. Lesson Learned!
customer_reviews.author: deborah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: We're loving this blender, which replaced our reliable old standby that had been serving us for 30 years. It sure does blend faster! Only two speeds, which is fine with me. Nice and simple. Sturdy construction.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Laubach

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this item. When I placed the jar into the base it fit so loosely it rocked back and forth. Also, the lid was pretty flimsy. I'm returning it but would be interested in knowing if anyone else found the same problems.
customer_reviews.author: nvann

customer_reviews.title: Powerful blender
customer_reviews.text: Great blender - lots of power. I only wish that it had a timer on it, like the 11 year old Cuisinart blender it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: emeltee

customer_reviews.title: Worst designed blender on the planet
customer_reviews.text: this is the worst blender ever. I cannot believe Cuisinart put their name on it. Usually I'm a fan of their products. Here's what's wrong: *the shape of the carafe causes the smallest amount of liquid to hit the top. If I'm trying to pour through the hole it spills everywhere. *it is impossible to pour product from the carafe without spilling. I have honestly tried. *don't even think about blending anything warm or hot. It will spill out everywhere. I'm not even selling this at a yard sale because the mess isn't even worth using it.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Poulin

customer_reviews.title: Not even worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This Cuisinart blender is made from sturdy materials BUT it is not a good machine. The base upon which the pitcher sits is just four prongs which allows the pitcher to shift and fall off the base. I used it 10 times and 4 of those times the pitcher fell off the base while running. Even though it needs to be seated properly, the pitcher is always unstable. I am returning this item and will buy another, better designed brand.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: love that it is glass
customer_reviews.text: love that it is glass. it wont scratch and discolor. it blends ice and frozen fruits perfectly and whips up batter for nice fluffy popovers.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis J Papierski

customer_reviews.title: Blade broke after less than a year of use.
customer_reviews.text: The blade detached from the base that is driven by the motor, so now it spins without cutting with even a little bit of resistance. Pretty much useless. You'd think that it would be a little more sturdy than that.
customer_reviews.author: Igor

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning is stupid simple-- drop a little dawn and water in
customer_reviews.text: Top quality glass, steel and iron. This thing should hopefully last a long time. Cleaning is stupid simple-- drop a little dawn and water in, and blend.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: with or without
customer_reviews.text: Extremely loud and the jar chatters and vibrates which is not held snugly between the four prongs that keep the cloverleaf jar from spinning. I'm not new to blenders and have an older 2 speed Waring with timer which still works fine and the jar is held snugly. I turned on my Waring and then the Quisinart both with empty jars for comparison and the Quisinart is not acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't blend.
customer_reviews.text: It blends around the blade only--you really have to stop, push stuff down, start again, push stuff down, repeat. Worst blender I've ever used. I would return it if I could.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Whittaker

customer_reviews.title: Overall amazing. Good
customer_reviews.text: Overall amazing. Good: the glass container and blades are all one piece that seem like they'll last a while. The clover leaf shape blends ice super quickly and evenly in a smoothie. Not as good: the container is a little small and drips down the side when you pour it.
customer_reviews.author: Cormorant

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Broke in under 3 months. The Waring that looks similar lasted 6 months prior to getting this one. Neither can handle frozen fruit.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Grimes

customer_reviews.title: Quality Made Blender!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best blender I've ever owned. It is all heavy glass and stainless steel. The bottom blade part is not an attachment so it won't come unscrewed! It is built into the carafe. It's just two speeds with a heavy duty toggle switch. Quality made product!
customer_reviews.author: JP Roland

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The product broke after about 3 weeks of blending smoothies. Similar to other reviews. The company should be ashamed. They are destroying brand. Stay away.
customer_reviews.author: NUM

customer_reviews.title: Looks Nice But Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: This blender appeared to be well-designed, with a metal base and a good glass jar instead of plastic pieces. Unfortunately the quality is not what I had hoped. After making about a dozen smoothies over the course of three months, the blender started to die. The motor smells like it's burning. I suspect it will stop working all together soon, and our counter will be graced with a very expensive e-waste sculpture. Extremely disappointed with this product. Will not be buying another Cuisinart.
customer_reviews.author: Fipling

customer_reviews.title: Look is deceiving
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it has that cool and smooth look but this is totally deceiving. The all glass carafe is not practical as it will break or chip on the bottom and then you cannot fit it to base anymore. Also, I do prefer when you can take the blades and carafe apart for easy and better cleaning. Also, the top cover is made of that very sturdy and hard plastic that won't bend at all and is not resilient when you try fit it on the carafe.
customer_reviews.author: Aga

customer_reviews.title: Like Others Report Plastic Lid Cracked
customer_reviews.text: I paid $100 for this about 4 months ago. About two months in the little round plastic part of the lid showed cracks. I only handwash everything because I find it easier than using a dishwasher. Anyway, very gently used, and now the lid is broken. I am going to duct tape it together to use until I can buy a much better quality blender. It does look beautiful. And it is loud. It makes ice blended drinks pretty well but not great. Cuisinart is really not high quality these days. I will pass on the whole brand.
customer_reviews.author: Uturn

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 8 months of light use
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and, for the first 8 months, worked great too. The base works just fine but the blades no longer spin against any resistance, even with just water in the jar. I would expect this lasting power from a $20 blender, not a $100 one. Very disappointed. Customer Service wants me to pay to ship it out to them, but I'm not sinking more money into this thing.
customer_reviews.author: KaseyDoodle

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: The cup is really really small. I also have always blended my beans before frying them. I cook the beans until super tender and after they cool put liquid and beans to blend, other blenders have handled this well, this one not well. Besides the fact that its small, my blender started smoking trying to blend my beans and there was tons of liquid in it. Smoothies with frozen fruit it did ok. Salsa, i had to really water down my salsa for it to blend it. Unfortunately its a gift and i dont have receipt so i cant return it. But its not something i would have picked out.
customer_reviews.author: dissapointed

product_meta.title: Cuisinart CBB-550SS Food and Beverage Blender, Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: Color:Stainless SteelThe Cuisinart Food and Beverage Blender is the classic blender that's perfect for any task. It mixes daiquiris and other delicious bar drinks, and also handles heavy-duty kitchen blending jobs with ease. The powerful 750 peak watt motor and ultra-sharp stainless blades quickly and easily crush ice and turn fruits and veggies into juices and smoothies. Designed for simple operation, it offers two speeds controlled by a one-touch toggle switch. When blending's done, the machine is a snap to clean - the sturdy zinc base wipes clean and the removable parts are dishwasher safe. Features: Classic waterfall base|Commercially rated heavy-duty motor|750 peak watts|40oz glass cloverleaf carafe with English and metric graduations|2-speed operation|2oz measuring lid|Limited Five Year Motor Warranty
feature_bullets: 750 peak watt motor for light and heavy blending tasks
40-oz. glass carafe with easy-to-read measurement markings
Two speeds for high and low blending

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars68 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
